import React, { Component } from "react"; import httpService from "../services/httpService"; import config from "../config.json"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import SupplierBidCards from "./supplierBidCards"; class SupllierBid extends Component { state = { tender: null }; async componentDidMount() { try { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/tenders/${this.props.tenderId}` ); this.setState({ tender: data.tender }); console.log(data.tender); } catch (error) { toast.error(error.message); return; } } renderItemList = () => { const { tender } = this.state; const srNo = 0; tender.itemList.map((item) => { srNo++; return ( {`#000${srNo}`} {item.category} {item.name} {item.unitOfMeasure} {item.quantity} 100 ); }); }; render() { if (this.state.tender === null) return null; return (
